titleStmt.title: By the Queene. Forasmuch as the Queenes Maiestie our souerayne lady is creibly informed, that the infection of the plague is at this present in sondry places, in [and] about the citie of London, and in other places neere adioyning the same ...
Proclamations. 1577-09-16
